    • Method Detail

      • loadEffect

        public static void loadEffect(java.lang.String effectName,
                              java.lang.String textureAtlasPackPath,
                              float frameSpeed)
        Load an effect into memory
        Parameters:
        effectName - name of effect, to be referenced later
        textureAtlasPackPath - path to the effect textureatlas resource file
        frameSpeed - speed of effect playback, should be ideally within a range of 0 to 1

      • createEffect

        public static Effect createEffect(java.lang.String effectName,
                                  com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 position,
                                  boolean looping,
                                  float scale)
        Create a loaded effect at a specified position
        Parameters:
        effectName - name of effect that is loaded into memory
        position - position of effect
        looping - whether the effect should loop
        scale - size of effect
        Returns:
        return the crated effect

      • render

                          com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch)
        Main render method
        Parameters:
        camera - Camera to draw on
        batch - SpriteBatch to draw with
